definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
autopolyploid (polyploid with chromosomes of single species)
allopolyploid (polyploid with chromosomes of different species)

sentences.english: The Tiandan303 is a genetic monogerm polyploid sugar beet hybrid.
sentences.chinese: 甜單303是甜菜遺傳單粒型多倍體雜交種。

sentences.english: Girdling and other treatments can induce polypoid plants to flower earlier.
sentences.chinese: 用環剝樹皮等方法可以誘導多倍體無性系提早開花。

sentences.english: Autopolyploids are genetically isolated from their parental diploids .
sentences.chinese: 同源多倍體與其親本二倍體在遺傳上相隔離。

sentences.english: Now, polyploid breeding is a commonly used method in crop breeding.
sentences.chinese: 而多倍體育種是近代作物育種常採用的一種方法。

sentences.english: The main exceptions to this are hybrid and polyploid speciation.
sentences.chinese: 對於這一點，最主要的例外是雜種和多倍體物種。

sentences.english: A polyploid is a plant with more than two complete sets of chromosomes .
sentences.chinese: 多倍體是具有兩套以上染色體的植物。

sentences.english: And union of unreduced gametes is the most important mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 其中，不減數配子是多倍體形成的主要機制。

sentences.english: Sublethal temperature might be suitable for polyploid inducement of cold shocks.
sentences.chinese: 亞致死溫度是低溫誘導多倍體的合適溫度。

sentences.english: This reveled that it was reliable to use the stoma characters to identify the polyploid.
sentences.chinese: 這說明利用氣孔特徵鑑定紅掌多倍體是可靠的。

sentences.english: The other is the disorder of synapsis of odd-numbered multiple polyploids.
sentences.chinese: 二是奇數倍多倍體聯會紊亂型。

sentences.english: Allopolyploid plants have a wide distribution in the nature.
sentences.chinese: 異源多倍體植物在自然界中廣泛分佈。

sentences.english: Chromosome reductional grouping happened more frequently in polyploid cells.
sentences.chinese: 染色體減數分組較多發生於多倍體細胞中。

sentences.english: A study of inducing polyploidy of Salvia miltiorrhiza Bunge in the process of tissue culture was made.
sentences.chinese: 應用組織培養技術進行人工誘導丹蔘多倍體的研究。

sentences.english: Total 43 polyploids individuals were obtained in this study.
sentences.chinese: 試驗共獲得杜仲多倍體植株43株。
